text: I constantly think about being dead  And I can t really talk to anyone about itFor the past several years I ve been fantasizing about being dead  Not killing myself  or any active participation in the dying aspect  Just  wouldn t it be great if I was hit by a bus right now  or  if I just dropped dead of an aneurism  In the past year these thoughts have become far more intrusive  They crop up all the time  I could be having a good time laughing with friends or family and I ll think   if I fell off of here I could be dead right now  that d be great   I m not even distressed or freaked out by these thoughts anymore  they ve become so constant they re just a fact of life for me now  When I think about it too much I feel ashamed and embarrassed to want to be dead when my life isn t really that hard or fucked up  I love my family and they are loving and awesome  But I just feel like I ve dug this deep  dark hole and someone is filling it in on top of me and I can t get out    I had a panic attack yesterday  and sobbed for a few hours over absolutely nothing  Then today I imagined blowing my brains out  It s the first time one I took an active role in one of my morbid daydreams  It really freaked me out  shocked and horrified  I m not suicidal right now   Immediately after the idea popped into my head I thought of what it would do to my mother  then I felt all sorts of awful  And helpless I really just don t know what to do with myself  I haven t and don t really want to bring it up with my friends and family  To have the awkward conversation about how I don t actually want to kill myself I just want to be dead  to cease to exist   Sorry I just really needed to get it out
